ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MAVEN SWIA Calibrated Fine Survey 3D Data Collection

RevisionEvent.Note: Draft metadata created by LFB (ADAPT code), final editing by AK

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: SWIA fine survey 3d files with time-ordered fully calibrated ion distributions in units of differential energy flux derived from the SWIA Fine distribution Survey telemetry, as well as a header of ancillary information needed to interpret the data. Description of the SWIA instrument can be found on the SWIA home page https://lasp.colorado.edu/maven/science/instrument-package/swia/ and in the SWIA instrument publication https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-013-0029-z.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator J.S. Halekas for use of these data.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Planetary Data System; Space Physics Data Facility

InformationURL.Name: MAVEN Data Archive at PDS PPI Node

AccessURL.Name: PDS PPI
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format at the Planetary Data System, Planetary Plasma Interactions node

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator D. Larson

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftps from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator J.S. Halekas. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator J.S. Halekas. Please also acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Time, start of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Description: Time, start of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, start of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, start of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, start of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, start of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Attenuator state
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Attenuator state, 1 = open, 2 = closed, 3 = cover closed

Parameter.Name: Data Coverage Flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Data Coverage Flag: 0 = 48E x 12D x 10A, 1 = 32E x 8D x 6A

Parameter.Name: Starting Energy Step
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Starting Deflection Step
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Raw Instrument counts
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Calibrated Differential Energy Flux [vary with time, energy, deflection index and anode angle] at 1st Deflection Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description:
Calibrated Differential Energy Flux [vary with time, energy, deflection index and anode angle] at 1st Deflection Index".
* Column 1 Labels from PHI_FINE: ["A1","A2","A3","A4","A5","A6","A7","A8","A9","A1"]. * Column 2 Labels from DINDEX: ["D1","D2","D3","D4","D5","D6","D7","D8","D9","D10","D11","D12"]. * Column 3 Labels from EINDEX: ["E1","E2","E3","E4","E5","E6","E7","E8","E9","E10","E11","E12","E13","E14","E15","E16","E17","E18","E19","E20","E21","E22","E23","E24","E25","E26","E27","E28","E29","E30","E31","E32","E33","E34","E35","E36","E37","E38","E39","E40","E41","E42","E43","E44","E45","E46","E47","E48"].

Parameter.Name: Movie [flux vs. energy and anode angle] at 1st Deflection Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: diff_en_fluxes.

Parameter.Name: Spectrogram at selected Azimuth Angle bins 1,4,7,10 at 1st Deflection Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: diff_en_fluxes.
